rows.label: bf07160100_0010
rows.name: Isn't that the Guardian...

rows.label: bf07160100_0020
rows.name: Just looks like a stone pillar to me.

rows.label: bf07160100_0030
rows.name:
It's a stone pillar where the village's
guardian deity is enshrined.

rows.label: bf07160100_0040
rows.name: Gramps, what's here?

rows.label: bf07160100_0045
rows.name:
Rex, try turning the
stone tablet clockwise.

rows.label: bf07160100_0050
rows.name: This one?

rows.label: bf07160100_0055
rows.name: Huh? This crest, it's...

rows.label: bf07160100_0060
rows.name: I've seen it before!

rows.label: bf07160100_0065
rows.name: Try placing your hand over the crest.

rows.label: bf07160100_0070
rows.name: Okay...

rows.label: bf07160100_0075
rows.name: Wh-what's this?

rows.label: bf07160100_0080
rows.name:
This path connects to the
center of the archipelago.

rows.label: bf07160100_0085
rows.name:
There lies the cavern known
as Spirit Crucible Elpys.

rows.label: bf07160100_0090
rows.name: Spirit Crucible Elpys...

rows.label: bf07160100_0095
rows.name:
This entrance and the gate
of the Spirit Crucible...

rows.label: bf07160100_0100
rows.name:
are sealed in such a way that only
a Liberalitan can open them.

rows.label: bf07160100_0105
rows.name:
Ahhh... So that's why Shin
needed me back then!

rows.label: bf07160100_0110
rows.name: When Adel built this village,

rows.label: bf07160100_0115
rows.name:
he hid something deep within the body of the Divine
Beast that forms the center of the archipelago.

rows.label: bf07160100_0120
rows.name:
Could it be that's the
sword we're talking about?

rows.label: bf07160100_0130
rows.name:
I don't know how the
information leaked out,

rows.label: bf07160100_0140
rows.name:
but many were led here by
rumors of the legendary sword.

rows.label: bf07160100_0145
rows.name:
More than a few have entered
the Spirit Crucible-

rows.label: bf07160100_0150
rows.name: but none have ever returned.

rows.label: bf07160100_0160
rows.name: Is it really that dangerous?

rows.label: bf07160100_0170
rows.name:
It's something he sealed away,
even separating it from Homura.

rows.label: bf07160100_0180
rows.name:
It has mechanisms to prevent
anyone from touching it.

rows.label: bf07160100_0190
rows.name: However, Adel also said this:

rows.label: bf07160100_0200
rows.name:
"The one who can obtain this sword is the
true Driver of Heaven's Holy Grail."

rows.label: bf07160100_0210
rows.name: The true Driver...

rows.label: bf07160100_0220
rows.name: What do you think, Rex?

rows.label: bf07160100_0230
rows.name: I'll go. No, I have to go.

rows.label: bf07160100_0240
rows.name:
Even while we're here,
Homura and Hikari are...

rows.label: bf07160100_0250
rows.name: So you've made up your mind, have you?
